data.text: I am Micah. I am from the town of Moresheth in Judah. Yahweh gave me these messages in visions about Samaria and Jerusalem during the time when Jotham, and then Ahaz, and then Hezekiah, were the kings of Judah.
You people everywhere on the earth, pay attention to this [DOU]!
He will come down from heaven
It will be as though the mountains will melt under his feet
Those things will happen because of the terrible sins [DOU] that the people [MTY] of Israel, the descendants of Jacob, have committed.
So Yahweh will cause Samaria to become a heap of rubble/ruins;
All the idols in Samaria will be smashed,
Because Samaria will be destroyed, I will weep and wail.
because Samaria will be completely destroyed [MET];
Do not tell that to our enemies in Gath city in Philistia!
You people who live in Shaphir town, whose name means ‘beautiful,’
The name of Maroth town sounds like ‘bitterness;’
You people of Lachish city, whose name sounds like ‘team,’
You people of Judah, send a farewell gift to the people of Moresheth town,
The name of your town of Mareshah means ‘conqueror,’
You people of Judah, shave your heads while you will be mourning,
